description: a sketch with several figures; at center a semi-reclining male with arms stretched out to side; in lower left a back view of a male figure with right arm pointing ahead and left hand braced on a rock; at lower right a man reclining on ground holding a sheild; three other partial figures, one at center and two along right edge; all in rust colored ink
inscription:
Inscription

below image in pencil: 2-311 by Julio Romano, from a pen & ink sketch   169 | in image in rust ink: in square lower left SR/IR  | upper right: PL
title: Print
